{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:05.900

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:09.900
    | text      = The good guy is the face, the bad guy is the heel.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:12.900
    | text      = The ultimate goal of a feud is to have the bad guy anger the audience,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:15.900
    | text      = whether it be by cheating in matches or having a shitty personality or whatever,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:19.900
    | text      = to the point where the audience wants to pay to see the face kick his ass.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:23.900
    | text      = There are variations in some middle grounds, but this is the basic dynamic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:27.900
    | text      = There are character types that only work as a heel or a face,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:31.900
    | text      = and trying to make them work in an opposite alignment does not play.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:35.900
    | text      = A cocky showboat who thinks they're too hot works as a heel but not as a face,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:39.900
    | text      = because the things that they have to do to play their character are inherently annoying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:44.900
    | text      = The exception to this would be Shawn Michaels, but he was a once-in-a-generation talent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:47.900
    | text      = and rules don't apply to people like him or Stone Cold or The Undertaker.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:53.900

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:59.900

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:06.900
    | text      = The giant they're fighting has thrown everything they have against them and they just won't stay down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:11.900
    | text      = People love that shit, to the point where it's such a powerful thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
